adDetails: Serving Sonoma and Marin counties, Tractor service, mowing, discing, fire breaks, fire protection, able to clear out brush, blackberries, scotch broom, tree removal and trimming service etc. Restore your land and take away a fire hazard and make your land usable again! No job too large or small, years of experience and several pieces of equipment to get the job done quickly and efficiently. Call Jim show contact info for a quote.
